articles.title: JOBY to Double U.S. Manufacturing Capacity: Growth Story Heating Up?
articles.mainIdea: JOBY to Double U.S. Manufacturing Capacity: Growth Story Heating Up?
articles.summary: Zacks: JOBY to Double U.S. Manufacturing Capacity: Growth Story Heating Up?. JOBY plans to double U.S. production capacity as demand for electric air taxis and federal support take flight. Related tickers mentioned: ACHR, JOBY, TOYOF.

articles.title: Hino to sell six sales subsidiaries in Japan
articles.mainIdea: Hino to sell six sales subsidiaries in Japan
articles.summary: Just Auto: Hino to sell six sales subsidiaries in Japan. Sales to be completed ahead of merger with Mitsubishi-Fuso. Related tickers mentioned: HINOF.

articles.title: Toyota plans to sell 3 US-built vehicles in Japan in 2026
articles.mainIdea: Toyota plans to sell 3 US-built vehicles in Japan in 2026
articles.summary: Wards Auto: Toyota plans to sell 3 US-built vehicles in Japan in 2026. The move comes shortly after a tariff deal opened the door for vehicles assembled in the U.S. to be sold in Japan without further testing.
